column4: hi all. I'm looking for a way to deny users to change system time. Can you help me?
do you have a administrator account on the said machine?
if yes, then you can untick the option "Administer System" for all the other users except yours. this way, only you can set the system clock.
sorry I've been busy :\ I'm quite sure I tried that way, but it didn't work. Just le t me start the vm again :)
